conference-2018.title: Hui ā-Tau Scratch 2018:
conference-2018.subtitle: Te Whakatipuranga Hou
conference-2018.dateDescMore: (ko te tuwheratanga ā te pō o te 25 o Hōngongoi)
conference-2018.seeBelow: Ākona ētahi kōrero anō mō ngā rā me ngā wāhi o te hui ā-tau.
conference-2018.desc1: Nau mai, haere mai ki te hui ā-tau mō Scratch@MIT, he hui wairua tākaro o te hunga kaiwhakaako, kairangahau hoki, kaiwaihanga hoki, me ētahi atu mema o te hapori Scratch o te ao.
conference-2018.desc2: Kei te whakarite mātou i tētahi hui ā-tau e whai wāhi ai te tangata, me tētahi rā mō tōna katoa he taiwhanga mahi ā-ringa, he maha hoki ngā mea angitu hei kōrero kanohi-ki-te-kanohi, hei mahi tahi hoki. Ko te hunga mā rātou tēnei hui ko ngā pākeke e āwhina i tā te taiohi, i tā te tamariki ako i te Scratch.
conference-2018.registrationDate: Ka tīmata ngā rēhitatanga ā te 1 Poutūterangi 2018.
conference-2018.sessionDesc: Ka hiahia koe ki tētahi tūnga? E whā ngā momo marohi e hiahia ana mātou:
conference-2018.sessionItem1Desc: Whakamenomenohia tō kaupapa i tētahi whakaaturanga nui, i te taha o kaiwhakaatu kē atu. Ka tukuna tētahi wāhi mō tētahi pānui whakaahua me tētahi wāhi tēpū mō tētahi rorohiko me ngā tohanga.
conference-2018.sessionItem2Desc: Whakaurua ngā tāngata ki ngā ngohe mahi ā-ringa, hei whakaatu i ngā huarahi hou mō te waihanga me te mahi tahi ki te Scratch.
conference-2018.sessionItem3Desc: Matapakina tētahi kaupapa Scratch, hei paewhiri kia tokotoru ngā tāngata tokomaha ake rānei.  Me whakamārama mai tō marohi ka pēhea koe e whakauru i te hunga mātakitaki i te wā o te whakaaturanga.
conference-2018.sessionItem4Desc: Tuaritia ō mahi, i tētahi whakaaturanga poto kia hīkaka hoki.
conference-2018.deadline: Ko te rā kati mō ngā marohi, hei te 5 o Huitanguru 2018.
conference-2018.proposalDeadline: Ko te rā kati mō ngā marohi, hei te 5 o Huitanguru
conference-2018.proposalAccept: Ka whakamōhio atu mō te whakaae: 1 Poutūterangi
conference-2018.registrationStandard: Rēhitatanga Noa (ā muri i te 1 Haratua): $300
conference-2018.questions: He Pātai? Whakapā mai ki te Tīma Scratch Team kei {emailLink}
conference-2018.submissionQ: Kua pahemo te rā kati. Ka taea tonutia rānei te tuku marohi mō te hui ā-tau?
conference-2018.submissionAns: Kua kati ināianei te wā tuku marohi.
conference-2018.regQ: Ka taea e au te haere ki te rā kotahi noa iho. Kei te tuku koutou i ngā rēhitatanga mō te rā kotahi noa iho?
conference-2018.regAns: Aroha mai, kāore he tīkete mō te rā kotahi noa.
conference-2018.accommodationsQ: Kei te hiahia ahau ki te whakarite i taku haerenga. He whakaaranga pea ā koutou mō ngā wāhi noho?
conference-2018.accommodationsAns1: Āe, ko ētahi o ngā hoa piri o MIT, he hōtera e whakaheke i te utu ki te hunga e haere ana ki ngā hui o MIT, ko: {marriottLink} (0.6km te tawhiti mai i te MIT Media Lab), {holidayinnLink} (2.5km), {residenceinnLink} (0.5 km), me {lemeridienLink} (1.5 km). Hei puka i tētahi rūma i tētahi o aua hōtēra, waea atu ki te hōtera, ā, tono atu mō te whakahekenga utu mō MIT. Kia wawe te whakarite, nā te mea ka muia a Boston i te raumati. Ka taea ngā utu MIT i ngā wā e wātea ana anake.
conference-2018.accommodationsAns2: Ki te hiahia koe ki ētahi atu momo wāhi noho, ko ētahi mea e pai ana ko {acLink} (11 km), {doubletreeLink} (5.3 km), me {hotelbostonLink} me te waehere MITSC2018 (8.5 km). Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki te aro ki ngā mea pērā ki te Airbnb. Kia kitea te rārangi nohoanga āhua roa nei, tirohia {mitLink}.
conference-2018.accommodationsAns3: Ka taea hoki te noho ki ngā rūma moe (he 'dorm') {neuLink} ka pēnei te utu:
conference-2018.accommodationsAns4: Ki te tono mō te rūma dorm, whakaotia te {dormrequestLink}. Kia mārama koe, kei Boston a Northeastern, e rua ngā maero mai i te wāhi e tū ai te hui ā-tau ki MIT. He haurua haora te haere mā runga waka tūmatanui, ka āhei mā te ara rarowhenua mā te Green Line (te tūnga Northeastern o runga i te E line), mā te Orange Line rānei (te tūnga Ruggles Station).
conference-2018.dormRequestText: Puka Tono mō te Huinga Rūma
conference-2018.letterAns: Āe, whakapā mai ki {emailLink}, ka tuku atu mātou i te reta mā te īmēra.
conference-2018.preConfQ: I ngā tau o mua, i tū tētahi pō takunetanga i te Wenerei i mua i te hui ā-tau. Ka tū anō tētahi takunetanga pērā i tēnei tau?
conference-2018.preConfAns: Ka tū tētahi huinga whakawhanaungatanga ōpaki, he mea kōwhiri noa, ā te pō o te Rāapa, 25 Hōngongoi. Ka āhei hoki ngā tāngata te rēhita i taua pō.
conference-2018.bringQ: He aha ngā mea me hari atu e au?
conference-2018.bringAns: Haria mai tētahi pūrere kawe (he pai ake ngā rorohiko pōnaho) me te taura hiko. Mā ngā kaiwhakaata e hari mai ngā rauemi whakaaturanga (mā mātou ngā pūrere tukuata me ngā ārai whakaatu e whakarato). Ka whakarato mātou i ngā paramanawa me ngā inu mō te rā.
conference-2018.moreAns: Whakapā mai ki te tīma Scratch, ki {emailLink}.
